qas.question: Where was the Arab Slave Trade?

context: Numerous communities of dark-skinned peoples are present in <a2_0>North Africa<a2_0/>, <a3_0>some dating from prehistoric communities.<a3_0/> Others are descendants of the historical <a4_0>Trans-Saharan trade in peoples<a4_0/> and/or, and after the Arab invasions of North Africa in <a1_0>the 7th century<a1_0/>, descendants of slaves from the Arab Slave Trade in <a0_0>North Africa<a0_0/>.
